title: Dragon's Dogma Dark Arisen [BestRepack.net]

------DESCRIPTION------

The first major expansion pack for Capcom's epic RPG, Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen will provide players with a whole new challenge when they land on the cursed Bitterblack Isle and come face-to-face with a host of fearsome new enemies. The aptly named Death and his trademark scythe will send the Arisen to his grave with one hit.
